articles.title: Spectacular Video Shows Massive Fireball Lighting Up Night Sky Over US - NDTV
articles.description: A spectacular fireball on Friday was spotted zooming over several US states, including Indiana and Wisconsin. The American Meteor Society (AMS) shared a video of the sighting and said that it received around 150 reports of the fireball.
articles.content:
This fireball was a "random occurrence" and not associated with any meteor shower.
